Author: cryptojokermic#0314
Content: I'm considering mining KMD. I have 2 rigs. 1 with 8 1060s and 1 with 8 1070s. Looks like I need to download a miner. Any quick tips ?

Content: @cryptojokermic what OS?

Author: xRobeSx#5136

Author: cryptojokermic#0314

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Ah, wait that release got rid of 200,9 support

Author: Alright#0419
Content: let me look

Author: Trystaero#7522
Content: @cryptojokermic bitpoolmining.com has a miner and monitoring tool all you need is a wallet address you can be up and mining in no time.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: download the latest version of this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2021765.0

Author: Alright#0419
Content: then extract it to a folder. Inside that folder create a new text file. Name it `miner.bat`(or anything followed by .bat) and put something like this in it `zm --server stratum.komodo.services --port 3333 --user <PUTYOURKMDADDRESSHERE> --pass x`

Author: Alright#0419
Content: save the file and double click it

Author: Alright#0419
Content: it will start mining with all your GPUs

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if you want to choose which GPUs to mine you can add `--dev 0 1 2 3 4` for example and it will mine with the first 5 GPUs

Author: Alright#0419
Content: After that, you'll see your address appear here http://pool.komodo.services/workers

Author: cryptojokermic#0314
Content: Sweet thanks. Very helpful.
